item.title: Mamas & Papas - California Dreamin'
item.description:
All the leaves
are brown
(All the leaves
are brown)
And the sky is gray
(And the sky is gray)
I’ve been for a walk
(I’ve been for a walk)
on a winter’s day
(on a winter’s day)

(I’d be safe and warm)
If I was in L.A.

California Dreaming

like the cold
